Title: Relates to visitation and custody rights involving non-U.S. citizens
Summary: Prohibits a court from providing for visitation or custody of a minor who is a U.S. citizen to a person who resides outside the U.S. when the other party to such action is a U.S. citizen and objects to such an order.
LawCode: Amd §§240, 75-e, 75, 77-b, 77-c, 77-e, 77-i & 77-l, Dom Rel L; amd §651, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to visitation and custody rights involving non-United States citizens
